messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Good morning.
Police, is this an emergency or can you hold?
It's an emergency. I think it's an emergency.
It sounds like we have gunshots off of Southwest 9 in Vermont.
Yes, we've got calls about Creston. There's a fellow on Creston Avenue that's shooting weapons. Just stay inside your house, okay?
Okay, thank you.
Hi, did you call 911?
Yes, my husband's on the phone. There's a guy here with an assault rifle shooting at police and aiming at our house.
You said he's trying to shoot at your house?
He was aimed at the house and now cars are going up and down Elston.
How many shots has he fired?
He's fired at least 30 or 40 shots. He's out there again.
Can you give me a description of him?
He's got blonde hair. I see him in the driveway now.
All right, stay in your house and lock your doors, okay? We're on the way.
Thank you. Bye.
Hello, this is the police department. We got a call from this number. Is everything okay?
There's a wild man across the street with an assault rifle. He set off at least 30 rounds.
Jesus, he's aiming the gun now and he's out in front of the house.
He's shooting at cars in the street.
He's shooting at somebody in the cars?
Yeah, he just shot at a car that was driving by. He laid down the rifle. He has camouflage pants on.
Tell me exactly where he is and what he's doing.
He's on the northeast corner of his house facing north, sitting on the back end of a white van.
Can you tell me the gun he has?
He's got at least two guns. Definitely an assault rifle of some type.
All right, stay inside and lock your doors. Officers are on the way.
Okay, thank you. Bye.
Hello? 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I need to report a neighbor firing a gun.
And you saw him do this?
Yes, he was on his back deck, firing the gun towards his yard.
Can you tell me his name if you know it?
His name is Steve Vogel.
Is he still out there now?
Jesus, yes. He's in his driveway now, wearing a black and yellow sweatshirt.
All right, stay on the line with me. Help is on the way.
Okay, thanks. Bye.
9-1-1, what's your emergency?
I've just been shot at.
Are you injured?
No, but my car windows have two holes from the bullets.
What kind of car are you in and where are you now?
I'm in a sky blue Nissan Altima and I'm on Broad Street, near Southwest 7th.
We have officers on the way. Just stay where you are.
Okay, thanks. Bye.
